author: admin
title: IBPS PO Exam 2017–2018 CWE PO/MT–VII Pre/Main Exam Notification
text: Check Now: IBPS PO Eligibility Criteria IBPS PO Eligibility 2017 Do you know that you are eligible or not for PO Exam? Candidates may check their eligibility criteria before appearing for examination. Nationality / Citizenship: A Citizen of India or A subject of Nepal or A subject of Bhutan or Tibetan refugee who came to India before 1st January, 1962 with the intention of permanently settling in India. A person of Indian origin who has migrated from Pakistan, Burma, Srilanka, East African countries of Kenya, Uganda, the United Republic of Tanzania, Zambia, Malawi, Zaire, Ethiopia and Vietnam with the intention of permanently settling in India. Educational Qualification: Aspirant willing to apply must possess Graduation Degree in any discipline or any equivalent qualification from a University/ Institute recognized by the Govt. of India. You May Also Check:- Latest Graduate Jobs Age Limitation: Participant should match age criteria that are minimum age 20 years and maximum age 30 years. Relaxation of Upper Age Limit: Sr. No.
